entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
